channel.title: Private Server question
channel.description: Ok,my computer is like 10 years old. I am going to use my dad's (or our family comp) to make and run my Private Server. He won't let me until hes sure no one can hack it from the game (IDK how thats possible). Can someone tell me if it is possible to get your computer hacked from hosting a private server?

item.title: Private Server question
item.dc:creator: @owned_nub owned nub
item.description:
@owned_nub wrote:

no-ipss cant hack u n00blets r0fl no-ip isn just same just set it to hide ip …

Read full topic

item.title: Private Server question
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

yes, no one can really hack you if you play moparscape.

Read full topic

item.title: Private Server question
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

they cant get into the computer through the game.they CAN hack into your computer when u give them your ip(not hamachi) to play on your server. becus of that, ALWAYS make a no-ip at http://www.no-ip.info so they cant see your ip, only your no ip, for example yourserver.no-ip.info instead of 123.123.12.12bcus they can get into this ->123.123.12.12 and cant get into this ->yourserver.no-ip.org(except to play the game, of course )

Read full topic

item.title: Private Server question

item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

Thank you soo much!!! Now I’m gonna make a server!!

Read full topic

item.title: Private Server question
item.dc:creator: @chipmunk_man chipmunk man
item.description:
@chipmunk_man wrote:

Amerks5:

Ok,my computer is like 10 years old. I am going to use my dad’s (or our family comp) to make and run my Private Server. He won’t let me until hes sure no one can hack it from the game (IDK how thats possible). Can someone tell me if it is possible to get your computer hacked from hosting a private server?

Noone will hack you if you make your own server. Hope that helped. And try going on a mods server, they won’t hack you. Don’t worry

Read full topic
